item.title: During the market pullback, the Hyperliquid whale continued to accumulate, with over $25 million in unrealized losses on their ETH short position.
item.description: On August 14th, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight, during a short-term market decline, three major whales took the opposite action and increased their short positions, resulting in a continuous increase in unrealized losses:The whale with the address starting with 0x7fdafd added $880,000 to their short position in ETH. Currently, they are facing an unrealized loss of $6,855,500, with a liquidation price of $6,958.909. They also hold a short position in HYPE (entry price $43.56), with an unrealized loss of $2,077,700.The whale with the address starting with 0x5d2f446 added $914,900 to their short position in BTC. They are facing an unrealized loss of $9,350,800, with a liquidation price of $130,124.643.The whale with the address starting with 0x20c2d increased their short position in ETH by 10.62 tokens (approximately $1,086,600). The total unrealized loss is $25,585,700, and the liquidation price is $6,072.300.

item.title: Huobi Responds to Fortune Article About Its Approximately 10% Ownership of Binance: Not Accurate
item.description: On August 14th, He Yi, a co-founder of Binance, responded to an article in Fortune on social media. He said, "Some details in the article are incorrect, such as the shareholding percentage. It has a very Western perspective, but rarity is not negative."Before this, Fortune reported that He Yi, a co-founder of Binance, owns approximately 10% of Binance.

item.title: LookOnChain: Ethereum Surges Past $4700
item.description: On August 14th, based on HTX market data, Ethereum has seen a rebound and exceeded $4700, with a 24-hour percentage change of 0.75%.

item.title: Federal Reserve's Mester: A 50 Basis Point Rate Cut Is Not Consistent with Current Economic Conditions or Data
item.description: On August 14th, Federal Reserve's Mester indicated that a 50-basis-point rate cut is not supported by the current economic conditions or data. (Xinhua News Agency)

item.title: U.S. Stock Bullish (BLSH) Surges Over 22%, Market Cap Exceeds $12 Billion
item.description: On August 14th, based on the market data from Rockflow, the US stock cryptocurrency exchange Bullish (BLSH) witnessed a surge of over 22%. It is currently trading at $83.28, and its market capitalization exceeds $12 billion.

item.title: Bitcoin Rebounds Above $119,000
item.description: On August 14th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin rebounded and rose above $119,000, with a 24-hour decline of 2.33%.

item.title: Yi Li Hua: In a bull market, each pullback is an opportunity to increase your position, but never use high leverage
item.description: On August 14th, the founder of Liquid Capital (formerly LD Capital), Li Hua Yi, posted on the X Platform, stating: "During a bull market, every pullback is an opportunity to increase holdings, and there is no need to worry about being stuck. However, it is absolutely necessary to avoid high leverage. The rise cannot be a straight line. If BTC rises to $150,000 and then pulls back to $110,000 and then rises above $180,000, this is also a very normal upward trend path. Those who use high leverage in the middle will become fuel. Therefore, it is better to focus on setting up off-chain income."

item.title: 「BNB Version of MicroStrategy」 BNC Announces Another Purchase of 88,888 BNB
item.description: August 14th. CEA Industries (BNC), which is backed by YZi Labs, declared an increase of 88,888 BNB as part of the "BNB Version Micro Strategy." After a rise of 200,000 BNB tokens earlier in this week, this increment represents another substantial stride towards BNC's publicly stated objective of holding 1% of the total BNB supply by the end of 2025.

item.title: Federal Reserve's Mester: Inflation Appears to Be Approaching 3%
item.description: August 14: Mester of the Federal Reserve stated that inflation seems to be approaching 3%. Tariffs are being passed on to inflation. The majority of the tariff's impact on inflation is anticipated to wane within 6 to 9 months, yet it may also persist for a longer duration. (FX168)

item.title: Ansem: The Altcoin Market Sentiment is at an All-Time Low, Predicting 2025 and 2026 to Be the Most Fruitful Years for Cryptocurrency Assets
item.description: On August 14th, the cryptocurrency key opinion leader (KOL) Ansem posted, saying, "The sentiment in the altcoin market is at an all-time low. Meanwhile, both BTC and ETH have reached all-time highs, and the external attention has also reached an all-time high."He predicted that 2025 and 2026 will be the most prosperous periods for cryptocurrency assets, mainly driven by innovative protocols that gain real-world applications and user recognition.
